title: Workout Mode on the iFit Vue
description: Visit our iFit Support page for more on your iFit Vue!

asset.author: iFit
asset.description: Visit our iFit Support page for more on your iFit Vue!

transcripts: In this tutorial we're going to teach you how to manually enter the workout mode feature on the IFit Vue. Press the square button on the screen to wake up your display on the IFit Vue, the date and time will always be the first thing you see when you first wake up your Vue. Now you'll need to press the square button repeatedly until the word workout is displayed on the screen, when workout is displayed on your screen double tap the square button of your IFit Vue to enter workout mode. Your iFit Vue will count down before starting a 15-minute workout by default, it will continue in workout mode until your workout is completed after completing your workout it will automatically transfer your workout stats to the iFit app. If you have a BLE heart rate monitor the Vue will automatically detect it and track your heart rate while in workout mode after starting your work out the heart rate will be shown on the iFit Vue.
